item.title: 梅赛德斯-奔驰预计今年利润率为 4% 至 6
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）在首次评估美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）与欧盟的贸易战所造成的损失时表示，预计其汽车业务今年的利润率为 4% 至 6%。【原文：Mercedes-Benz expects a profit margin of 4% to 6% this year for its car business, the automaker said in its first assessment of the damage from U.S. President Donald Trump's trade war with the European Union.】

item.title: 瑞银集团第二季度盈利 24 亿美元，超出预期
item.description: 瑞银集团周三表示，由于市场动荡推动了交易活动，第二季度利润比去年同期增长了一倍多。【原文：UBS said on Wednesday that second-quarter profit more than doubled from a year earlier as market turmoil drove trading activity.】

item.title: 早安本周不再睡觉
item.description: 格雷戈尔-斯图尔特-亨特（Gregor Stuart Hunter）展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天：【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Gregor Stuart Hunter:】

item.title: 丰田汽车 1-6 月全球产销量创历史新高
item.description: 丰田公司周三表示，在北美、日本和中国等市场强劲需求的推动下，该公司今年前六个月的全球产销量创下历史新高。【原文：Toyota said on Wednesday its worldwide output and sales reached record highs for the first six months of the year, fuelled by strong demand in markets including North America, Japan and China.】

item.title: 汇丰银行上半年利润下降 26%，低于预期
item.description: 汇丰控股周三公布的上半年税前利润下滑 26%，不及分析师预期，原因是对交通银行的投资减值 21 亿美元。【原文：HSBC Holdings reported a 26% slide in first-half pretax profit on Wednesday, missing analyst estimates, as a $2.1 billion impairment from its investment in Bank of Communications weighed.】

item.title: 恒大面临退市，中国房地产债务重整步履维艰
item.description: 中国恒大集团（China Evergrande Group）因未能重整债务而被迫清盘，下个月将被踢出香港交易所。【原文：China Evergrande Group looks set to be kicked off the Hong Kong exchange next month after failing to revamp its debt and being pushed into liquidation, with the stubbornly weak Chinese property sector clouding the outlook for debt restructuring by its peers.】

item.title: 美国第二季度经济增长可能出现反弹，但基本细节薄弱
item.description: 随着进口流量的减少，美国第二季度的经济增长可能会出现反弹，但预计消费者支出将温和增长，而企业设备投资将停滞不前，这将严重夸大经济的健康状况。【原文：U.S. economic growth likely rebounded in the second quarter as the flow of imports subsided, but with consumer spending anticipated to have increased moderately and business investment in equipment stalled that would grossly exaggerate the economy's health.】

item.title: 现代汽车集团郑会长赴美支持韩国贸易谈判 - Yonhap
item.description: 据韩联社报道，现代汽车集团执行董事长郑义宣将于周三前往华盛顿，支持韩国推动与美国达成贸易协议。【原文：Hyundai Motor Group Executive Chair Euisun Chung will travel to Washington on Wednesday to support South Korea's push for a trade deal with the United States, the Yonhap news agency reported.】

item.title: 消息人士称台湾贸易代表团将赴美继续关税谈判
item.description: 四位熟悉内情的人士周三告诉路透社，台湾贸易代表团将继续在华盛顿与美国就关税问题进行谈判。【原文：A Taiwan trade delegation will continue talks with the United States on tariffs in Washington, four people familiar with the matter told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市持稳，投资者为关税最后期限和美联储做准备
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市小幅上涨，投资者在中美贸易谈判结束但未达成任何实质性协议后以及美联储宣布政策前持谨慎态度。【原文：Asian stocks rose modestly on Wednesday, with investors cautious after trade talks between the U.S. and China ended without any substantive agreement and ahead of the Federal Reserve's policy announcement.】

item.title: Dye & Durham 考虑出售或合并，与投资者 Plantro 达成停战协议
item.description: Dye & Durham 公司周二表示，将审查战略替代方案，以稳定财务状况，甚至可能考虑出售自己，该公司与第二大投资者 Plantro 公司达成和解，避免了代理权争夺战。【原文：Dye & Durham will review strategic alternatives to stabilize its finances and may even consider selling itself, it said on Tuesday, reaching a settlement that avoids a proxy fight with its second-largest investor, Plantro.】

item.title: 澳大利亚第二季度通胀率意外偏低，预示着将降息
item.description: 周三的数据显示，澳大利亚6月份消费者物价增速为四年多来最慢，核心通胀率创下三年新低，巩固了市场对下月降息的预期。【原文：Australian consumer prices grew at the slowest pace in over four years in the June quarter, data showed on Wednesday, while core inflation hit a fresh three-year low and cemented market wagers for a cut in interest rates next month.】

item.title: 特朗普通俄最后通牒引发油价大涨后保持稳定
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）向莫斯科提出缩短结束乌克兰战争的最后期限后，潜在的供应短缺问题成为焦点，油价在周三早盘交易中上扬。【原文：Oil prices ticked up in early trading on Wednesday after rising more than 3% in the previous session as potential supply shortages came into focus after U.S. President Donald Trump gave Moscow an abbreviated deadline toward ending the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，LG 能源解决方案公司与特斯拉签署了价值 43 亿美元的电池供应协议
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士周三表示，韩国电池制造商 LG Energy Solution (LGES) 已经签署了一份价值 43 亿美元的合同，为特斯拉提供用于储能系统的磷酸铁锂电池。【原文：South Korean battery maker LG Energy Solution (LGES) has signed a $4.3 billion contract to supply Tesla with lithium iron phosphate (LFP) batteries for energy storage systems, a person familiar with the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 贸易协议达成后欧元徘徊在一个月低点附近，焦点转向美联储
item.description: 欧元周三在一个月来的最低点附近企稳，本周跌幅巨大，原因是投资者计算了美国-欧盟贸易协定的成本，并对美联储和日本央行的政策会议进行了展望。【原文：The euro steadied near its lowest in a month on Wednesday, nursing steep losses this week as investors counted the cost of the U.S.-EU trade pact and looked ahead to policy meetings from the Federal Reserve and the Bank of Japan.】

item.title: LG 能源解决方案签署 43 亿美元电池供应合同
item.description: 韩国电池制造商 LG Energy Solution（LGES）周三表示，该公司已签署了一份价值 43 亿美元的合同，将在三年内向全球供应磷酸铁锂（LFP）电池，但未透露客户身份。【原文：South Korean battery maker LG Energy Solution (LGES) said on Wednesday it had signed a $4.3 billion contract to supply lithium iron phosphate (LFP) batteries over three years globally, without identifying the customer.】

item.title: 日产汽车将于 2026 年 3 月停止墨西哥 Civac 工厂的生产
item.description: 日本汽车制造商日产汽车公司周三表示，作为其全球重组计划的一部分，该公司将在 2026 年 3 月之前停止墨西哥 Civac 工厂的生产。【原文：Japanese automaker Nissan said on Wednesday that the company would stop production at its Civac plant in Mexico by March 2026 as part of its global restructuring plan.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，壳牌领导的加拿大液化天然气公司在增产过程中面临问题
item.description: 据四个消息来源和 LSEG 船舶跟踪数据显示，壳牌领导的加拿大液化天然气公司（LNG Canada）在基蒂马特（Kitimat）的液化天然气工厂提高产量时遇到了技术问题，最近几天有一艘液化天然气油轮在没有超冷燃料的情况下改道离开了该工厂。【原文：Shell-led LNG Canada is experiencing technical problems as it ramps up production at its liquefied natural gas plant at Kitimat, with one LNG tanker diverting away from the facility without the superchilled fuel in recent days, according to four sources and LSEG ship tracking data.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，美国费米实验室遭遇针对微软 SharePoint 的网络攻击
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引美国能源部发言人的话报道，能源部 17 个国家实验室之一的美国费米国家加速器实验室（U.S. Fermi National Accelerator Laboratory）遭到了黑客的攻击，这是最近一场试图利用微软 SharePoint 软件缺陷的活动的一部分。【原文：U.S. Fermi National Accelerator Laboratory, one of the Department of Energy's 17 national labs, was attacked by hackers as part of a recent campaign seeking to exploit flaws in Microsoft's SharePoint software, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing a spokesperson from the department.】

item.title: 韩国财政部长加入美国贸易协议的最后一搏
item.description: 首尔周三表示，三名韩国内阁级官员在华盛顿会见了美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick），以推动达成一项贸易协议。【原文：Three South Korean cabinet-level officials met U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick in Washington in a push to close a trade deal, Seoul said on Wednesday, squaring off with a key U.S. official driving a hard bargain just ahead of a deadline.】

item.title: 受人爱戴 "的 Blackstone 高管 LePatner 在曼哈顿遇害，被缅怀为行业领袖
item.description: 周二，Blackstone 员工努力接受 Wesley LePatner 的死讯，她是该投资公司的高级管理人员之一，周一晚些时候在离开曼哈顿中城办公室时被枪杀。【原文：Blackstone employees struggled on Tuesday to come to terms with the death of Wesley LePatner, one of the investment firm's senior executives who was gunned down late on Monday as she was leaving her Midtown Manhattan office.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，Kraken 以 150 亿美元估值寻求 5 亿美元融资
item.description: 据 The Information 周二援引知情人士的话报道，加密货币交易所 Kraken 将以 150 亿美元的估值融资 5 亿美元。【原文：Cryptocurrency exchange Kraken is set to raise $500 million in funding at a $15 billion valuation, The Information reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚将 YouTube 列入儿童社交媒体禁令
item.description: 澳大利亚周三表示，将把 Alphabet 旗下的 YouTube 纳入其全球首个针对青少年的社交媒体禁令，从而推翻了早些时候关于视频共享平台豁免的决定。【原文：Australia said on Wednesday it will include Alphabet-owned YouTube in its world-first ban on social media for teenagers, reversing an earlier decision to exempt the video-sharing platform.】

item.title: 随着墨西哥现场音乐市场的发展，Live Nation 将加快增购 Ocesa 24% 的股份
item.description: Live Nation Entertainment 公司周二表示，随着墨西哥成为一个重要的现场音乐活动市场，该公司将加快收购墨西哥音乐会推广商 Ocesa 公司 24% 的股份。【原文：Live Nation Entertainment said on Tuesday it will accelerate the purchase of an additional 24% stake in Mexican concert promoter Ocesa, as Mexico becomes a prominent market for live music events.】

item.title: 剥离资产、需求疲软拖累 PPG 工业公司季度利润不及预期
item.description: 受近期业务剥离和主要市场需求疲软的影响，全球涂料供应商 PPG 工业公司周二公布的第二季度利润不及华尔街预期。【原文：Global paint supplier PPG Industries missed Wall Street expectations for second-quarter profit on Tuesday, hurt by the impact of recent business divestitures and softer demand in key markets.】

item.title: 泰瑞达因芯片测试需求强劲，季度收入超出预期
item.description: 泰瑞达公司周二公布的第二季度营收超出华尔街预期，这主要得益于市场对该公司半导体测试设备的稳定需求，公司股价在盘后交易中上涨了 3.5%。【原文：Teradyne beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter revenue on Tuesday, helped by steady demand for the company's semiconductor-testing equipment, sending its shares 3.5% higher in extended trading.】

item.title: 美国女性专用约会建议应用 Tea 在出现漏洞后暂停发送信息
item.description: 美国女性专用约会咨询应用 Tea 公司周二表示，由于一系列安全漏洞事件暴露了用户的个人资料和敏感通讯信息，该公司已暂停直接发送信息。【原文：The women-only U.S. dating advice app Tea has suspended direct messaging following a series of security breaches that exposed its users' personal details and sensitive communications, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 交易日：美联储迫在眉睫，股市下跌，美元上涨
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets】

item.title: 希捷第一季度营收和利润低于预期，股价暴跌
item.description: 希捷科技（Seagate Technology）周二预测第一季度营收略低于华尔街预期，受个人电脑市场持续不确定性导致存储设备需求疲软的影响，该公司股价在盘后交易中下跌了 8%。【原文：Seagate Technology forecast first-quarter revenue slightly below Wall Street expectations on Tuesday, hurt by weak demand for its storage devices amid ongoing uncertainty in the personal computer market, sending its shares down 8% in extended trading.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，纽约证交所母公司 ICE 正洽谈以 60 亿美元估值收购 Enverus
item.description: 纽约证券交易所母公司洲际交易所 彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，纽交所母公司洲际交易所正在洽谈收购 Enverus 公司，该交易将使这家能源数据和分析专业公司的估值达到 60 亿美元。【原文：NYSE parent Intercontinental Exchange is in talks to buy Enverus in a deal that would value the energy data and analytics specialist firm at $6 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】
